name: names-bs
description: displays a wordcloud for first names from Basel/Switzerland and allows the comparison of frequency over time for selected names to other names.

name: delphi-bs
description: Prototype for a information system adapted for handheld devices. Gives access to various datasets published by data.bs and the Office for Statistics of Basel/Switzerland.

name: foph-covid19-data-explorer
description: This app allows to explore the datasets used in the Federal Office of Public Health's (FOPH) dashboard.

name: lqx-bs
description: LQX-bs allows to explore air quality data from the station St. Johannplatz in Basel. data may be presented as statistics and in various plot-types. There is also an option to demonstrate the impact of fireworks.

name: speed-ex-bs
description: Statistische und graphische Auswertung der Geschwindigkeitsübertretungen im Kanton Basel-Stadt seit 2018.

name: impf-prognose-bs
description: This applicaton allows to estimate the current status of covid-19 vaccinations of the population of Basel/Switzerland. Current vaccination and population data is read from the opendata portal data.bs.ch

name: lukas-apps
description: This is the app you are looking at. It's a very simple flask-app listing all apps from my github repo.

name: pgmn-report-generator
description: This app generates water level reports for the Ontario Provincial Monitoring Network (PGMN). It also provides a simple example on how to generate a pdf document with figures and tables using python, pdfkit and jinja2

name: Rhein-Pegel
description: Shows the Rhine-River-level in an animated barchart compared to precipitation in the same period.

name: groundwater.bs
description: App holds a series of interactive articles on groundwater quality and quantity in Basel

name: bach-app
description: Simple app to display the current temperature of the Rine River

name: digital mailbox
description: Simple drop box where files can be dropped together with the sender's name as well as optionally with a comment. The file log.csv keeps track of who dropped the files

name: smart-bs
description: Visualizes sensor data of the smart-city project in Basel

name: el-verbrauch-zh
description: Visualizes electricity consumption of the city of Zürich

name: witterung-bs
description: Allows to visualize > 100 years of weather data of Basel (Switzerland)

name: impfviz-bs
description: In this app, vaccinations and infections are combined in a dataaset and the population vaccination state can be visualized resulting from both effects. The simulation also takes into account the estimation of the dark figure of non reported infections

name: ODS-Explorer
description: This app allows to explore a selection of more than 20 sites built with the [Opendatasoft](https://www.opendatasoft.com/). The user can explore all metadata, query data quicly access all datasets at their origin. The app also allows to subsribe to a selection of catalogs. They will subsequently be notified if new datasets appear in theses datasets.
